schema.name: Mailing address is equal to office address
Please select the area of your activity

value.value: SELECT A.*,  'ITC' SOURCE, '@{item().name}' FILE_NAME, GETDATE ()  LOAD_TIMESTAMP FROM DWH.@{variables('V_STAGE_TABLE')} A

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT R.PERIOD_START,R.PERIOD_END,R.SNAP_DATE,R.BATCH_NBR,PIPELINE_NAME  FROM DWH.PIPELINE_INFO P, DWH.PIPELINE_RUNS R  WHERE P.PIPELINE_ID = R.PIPELINE_ID AND R.PIPELINE_RUN_STATUS = '1' AND P.PIPELINE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_PIPELINE_NAME}'

SELECT R.PERIOD_START,R.PERIOD_END,R.SNAP_DATE,R.BATCH_NBR,PIPELINE_NAME  FROM DWH.PIPELINE_INFO P, DWH.PIPELINE_RUNS R  WHERE P.PIPELINE_ID = R.PIPELINE_ID AND R.PIPELINE_RUN_STATUS = '1' AND P.PIPELINE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_PIPELINE_NAME}'

}

SrcStageCRM derive(NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'CRM/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,

		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,

		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,

		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHCRM

source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM1
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(ENTITY_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_ENTITY',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingDIMMax
srcALL filter({Professional status}!='Self-employed/ freelancer') ~> FilterProfessionalStatus
FilterProfessionalStatus select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Professional status},
		{BSO ownership},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		Website,
		Twitter,
		LinkedIn,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		Region,
		Postalcode,
		Cityregion,
		{Name of the entity},
		{Account Name},
		{Office Address: Country},
		Category,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		{Office Address: State/Province},
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Street 1},
		{Mailing Address: Street 2},
		{Mailing Address: City},
		{Mailing Address: State/Province},
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Country},
		{UN Mailing Format},
		Account,
		Phone,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqCol
SelectReqCol derive(ENTITY_NAME = case(isNull({Organization/ Company name})==false(),
     {Organization/ Company name},
     isNull({Name of the entity})==false(),
     {Name of the entity},
     isNull(Account)==false(),
     Account,
     isNull({Account Name})==false(),
     {Account},
     ''),
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = substring(Email, instr(Email, '@')+1),
		ADDRESS = case(isNull(Address)==false(),
     Address,
     isNull({Office Address})==false(),
     {Office Address},
     isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
     {Office Address: Street 1},
     ''),
		CITY = case(isNull(City)==false(),
     City,
     isNull(Cityname)==false(),
     Cityname,
     isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
     {Office Address: City},
     ''),
		REGION = Region,
		PHONE_NUMBER = {Phone number},
		WEBSITE = Website,
		TWITTER = Twitter,
		LINKEDIN = LinkedIn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP = {BSO ownership},
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
     {Post Code},
     isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
     Postalcode,
     isNull({Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code})==false(),
     {Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
     ''),
		POBOX = {Office Address: Street 2},
		CITY_REGION = case(isNull(Cityregion)==false(),
     Cityregion,
     isNull({Office Address: State/Province})==false(),
     {Office Address: State/Province},
     ''),
		CATEGORY = Category,
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 = {Mailing Address: Street 1},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 = {Mailing Address: Street 2},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY = {Mailing Address: City},
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE = {Mailing Address: State/Province},
		MAILING_POST_CODE = {Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		MAILING_COUNTRY = {Mailing Address: Country},
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN = {UN Mailing Format}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS = DerivedColumn1@ADDRESS,
		CITY = DerivedColumn1@CITY,
		REGION = DerivedColumn1@REGION,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE = DerivedColumn1@WEBSITE,
		TWITTER = DerivedColumn1@TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN = DerivedColumn1@LINKEDIN,
		SOURCE,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY = DerivedColumn1@CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedColumn1@CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIM
SelectDIM aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
AggDistinct derive(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> SourceHASHRecords
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestRecord
ExistingDIM, LatestRecord join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestRecord@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestRecord@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(EXISTING_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> ExitingHASHRecords
SourceHASHRecords, SelectExiting exists(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD == EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, SelectExiting lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
ExitingHASHRecords select(mapColumn(
		EXISTING_ENTITY_SR_KEY = ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXISTING_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME = ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExiting
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord keyGenerate(output(NEW_ENTITY_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1, ExistingDIMMax join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxID
JoinMaxID derive(ENTITY_ID = MAX_VAL+NEW_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXISTING_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		REGION,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE,
		TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY1

source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,

		EMAIL as string,

		MIDDLE_NAME as string,

source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(PARTICIPANT_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_PARTICIPANT',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingDimMAX
SrcAll select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Last name},
		{Middle name},
		{First name},
		Gender,
		{Year of birth},
		{Date of birth},
		{Job title},
		{Professional status},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		{Date of birth2},
		Nationality,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		id,
		Username,
		Title,
		Functional_title,
		Howlong,
		Priorexperience,
		Pobox,
		Postalcode,
		Skype,
		Aim,
		Yahoo,
		Msn,
		Cityregion,
		Uniqueid,
		User_id,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		Salutation,
		Phone,
		{Preferred Language},
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqColumns
SelectReqColumns derive(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID = iifNull(Email, upper(trim({First name}))+upper(trim({Last name}))+upper(trim(Gender))+upper(trim({Year of birth}))),
		EMAIL = Email,
		LAST_NAME = {Last name},
		MIDDLE_NAME = {Middle name},
		FIRST_NAME = {First name},
		GENDER = Gender,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH = {Year of birth},
		NATIONALITY = Nationality,
		JOB_TITLE = case(isNull({Job title})==false(),
     {Job title},
     isNull(Functional_title)==false(),
     Functional_title,
     ''),
		ADDRESS = iif({Professional status}=='Self-employed/ freelancer', 
    case(isNull(Address)==false(),
            Address,
         isNull({Office Address})==false(),
            {Office Address},
         isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
            {Office Address: Street 1},
         ''),
    ''),
		ID = case(isNull(id)==false(),
    id,
    isNull(Uniqueid)==false(),
    Uniqueid,
    ''),
		USERNAME = case(isNull(Username)==false(),
    Username,
    isNull(User_id)==false(),
    User_id,
    ''),
		HOWLONG = Howlong,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE = Priorexperience,
		SALUTATION = case(isNull(Title)==false(),
    Title,
    isNull(Salutation)==false(),
    Salutation,
    ''),
		CITY_NAME = case(isNull(City)==false(),
    City,
    isNull(Cityname)==false(),
    Cityname,
        isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
    {Office Address: City},
    ''),
		POBOX = case(isNull(Pobox)==false(),
    Pobox,
    isNull({Office Address: Street 2})==false(),
    {Office Address: Street 2},
    ''),
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
    {Post Code},
    isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
    Postalcode,
    ''),
		SKYPE = Skype,
		AIM = Aim,
		YAHOO = Yahoo,
		MSN = Msn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CITY_REGION = Cityregion,
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE = {Preferred Language},
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = Phone) ~> DerivedDIMCol
DerivedDIMCol select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EMAIL = DerivedDIMCol@EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER = DerivedDIMCol@GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		NATIONALITY = DerivedDIMCol@NATIONALITY,
		JOB_TITLE,
		ADDRESS = DerivedDIMCol@ADDRESS,
		ID = DerivedDIMCol@ID,
		USERNAME = DerivedDIMCol@USERNAME,
		HOWLONG = DerivedDIMCol@HOWLONG,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		SALUTATION = DerivedDIMCol@SALUTATION,
		CITY_NAME,
		POBOX = DerivedDIMCol@POBOX,
		POST_CODE,
		SKYPE = DerivedDIMCol@SKYPE,
		AIM = DerivedDIMCol@AIM,
		MSN = DerivedDIMCol@MSN,
		SOURCE,
		CITY_REGION,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedDIMCol@CONFIDENTIAL,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = DerivedDIMCol@{PHONE NUMBER},
		YAHOO = DerivedDIMCol@YAHOO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIMCol
SelectDIMCol aggregate(groupBy(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID),
	each(match(name!='UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
AggDistinct derive(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD = sha2(256,EMAIL,
LAST_NAME,
MIDDLE_NAME,
FIRST_NAME,
GENDER,
YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
NATIONALITY,
JOB_TITLE,
ADDRESS,
ID,
USERNAME,
HOWLONG,
PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
SALUTATION,
CITY_NAME,
POBOX,
POST_CODE,
SKYPE,
AIM,
YAHOO,
MSN,
SOURCE,
CITY_REGION,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_EMAILS,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
CONFIDENTIAL,
{PHONE NUMBER})) ~> SourceHASHRecords
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(PARTICIPANT_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestRecord
ExistingDIM, LatestRecord join(ExistingDIM@PARTICIPANT_ID == LatestRecord@PARTICIPANT_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestRecord@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(EXISTING_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,EMAIL,
LAST_NAME,
MIDDLE_NAME,
FIRST_NAME,
GENDER,
YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
NATIONALITY,
JOB_TITLE,
ADDRESS,
ID,
USERNAME,
HOWLONG,
PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
SALUTATION,
CITY_NAME,
POBOX,
POST_CODE,
SKYPE,
AIM,
YAHOO,
MSN,
SOURCE,
CITY_REGION,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_EMAILS,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
CONFIDENTIAL,
PHONE_NUMBER),
		EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID = iifNull(EMAIL, upper(trim(FIRST_NAME))+upper(trim(LAST_NAME))+upper(trim(GENDER))+toString(YEAR_OF_BIRTH),EMAIL)) ~> ExitingHASHRecords
ExitingHASHRecords select(mapColumn(
		EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY = PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY,
		EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_ID = ExistingDIM@PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EXISTING_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
		EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExiting
SourceHASHRecords, SelectExiting exists(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD == EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, SelectExiting lookup(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID == EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecords, UpdatedRecords)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecords keyGenerate(output(NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1, ExistingDimMAX join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxID
JoinMaxID derive(NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID = MAX_VAL+NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdatedRecords derive(VERSION_NO = EXISTING_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		YAHOO as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> iDIMPARTICIPANT

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,

		FirmID as string,

		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNTF
source(output(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
SrcNTF select(mapColumn(
		INTERVIEW_KEY = interviewkey,
		INTERVIEW_ID = interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = A01,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = A02,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = A03,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = A07,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = A09,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = A10,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = A11,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = A12,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
DISTINCT derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIERWER_NAME,
INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
SUPERVISOR_NAME,
TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
INTERVIEW_DURATION,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIEW_ID)) ~> SourceRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExistingDIM exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH_VALUE,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentTimestamp(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentTimestamp()) ~> RunInfor
RunInfor alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
SelectColumns aggregate(groupBy(INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		FILE_NAME),
	COUNT = count()) ~> DISTINCT
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE = SOURCE_RECORD_HASH,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS
